title: Shamaim
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Israeli and Middle Eastern cuisine restaurant near Ekoda station. Has a range of vegetarian and vegan meal options and serves Arabic espresso, selection of beer, wine, and cocktails. Belly dancing show the last Friday of each month. Plenty of seating inside.
